00041 #ifndef NS_MAXMSG
00042 #define NS_MAXMSG 65535
00043 #endif
00044

00046 #ifdef MAXDNAME
00047 #define NS_MAXDNAME MAXDNAME
00048 #endif
00049 #endif

00051 #ifndef T_SRV
00052 #define T_SRV 33
00053 #endif

00055 #define OP_REG  0
00056 #define OP_UNREG 1

00064                   enum ccn_upcall_kind kind,

00071 void
00072 ccndc_daemonize(struct ccndc_data *ccndc)
00073 {
00074     struct ccn_closure interest_closure = { .p=&incoming_interest, .data = (void *)ccndc };
00075     struct ccn_charbuf *temp = ccn_charbuf_create();
00076     
00077     /* Set up a handler for interests */
00078     ccn_name_from_uri(temp, "ccnx:/");
00079     ccn_set_interest_filter_with_flags(ccndc->ccn_handle, temp, &interest_closure,
00080                                        CCN_FORW_ACTIVE | CCN_FORW_CHILD_INHERIT | CCN_FORW_LAST);
00081     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&temp);
00082     
00083     ccndc_note(__LINE__, "Starting dynamic DNS-based FIB prefix resolution\n");
00084     ccn_run(ccndc->ccn_handle, -1);
00085 }
00086 
00087 int
00088 ccndc_query_srv(const unsigned char *domain, int domain_size,
00089                 char **hostp, int *portp, char **proto)
00090 {
00091     union {
00092         HEADER header;
00093         unsigned char buf[NS_MAXMSG];
00094     } ans;
00095     ssize_t ans_size;
00096     char srv_name[NS_MAXDNAME];
00097     int qdcount, ancount, i;
00098     unsigned char *msg, *msgend;
00099     unsigned char *end;
00100     int type = 0, class = 0, ttl = 0, size = 0, priority = 0, weight = 0, port = 0, minpriority;
00101     char host[NS_MAXDNAME];
00102     
00103     res_init();
00104     
00105     /* Step 1: construct the SRV record name, and see if there's a ccn service gateway.
00106      *         Prefer TCP service over UDP, though this might change.
00107      */
00108     
00109     *proto = "tcp";
00110     if (domain_size != 0) {
00111         snprintf(srv_name, sizeof(srv_name), "_ccnx._tcp.%.*s", domain_size, domain);
00112         ans_size = res_query(srv_name, C_IN, T_SRV, ans.buf, sizeof(ans.buf));
00113     } else {
00114         snprintf(srv_name, sizeof(srv_name), "_ccnx._tcp");
00115         ans_size = res_search(srv_name, C_IN, T_SRV, ans.buf, sizeof(ans.buf));
00116     }
00117     
00118     if (ans_size < 0) {
00119         *proto = "udp";
00120         if (domain_size != 0) {
00121             snprintf(srv_name, sizeof(srv_name), "_ccnx._udp.%.*s", domain_size, domain);
00122             ans_size = res_query(srv_name, C_IN, T_SRV, ans.buf, sizeof(ans.buf));
00123         } else {
00124             snprintf(srv_name, sizeof(srv_name), "_ccnx._udp");
00125             ans_size = res_search(srv_name, C_IN, T_SRV, ans.buf, sizeof(ans.buf));
00126         }
00127         if (ans_size < 0)
00128             return (-1);
00129     }
00130     if (ans_size > sizeof(ans.buf))
00131         return (-1);
00132     
00133     /* Step 2: skip over the header and question sections */
00134     qdcount = ntohs(ans.header.qdcount);
00135     ancount = ntohs(ans.header.ancount);
00136     msg = ans.buf + sizeof(ans.header);
00137     msgend = ans.buf + ans_size;
00138     
00139     for (i = qdcount; i > 0; --i) {
00140         if ((size = dn_skipname(msg, msgend)) < 0)
00141             return (-1);
00142         msg = msg + size + QFIXEDSZ;
00143     }
00144     /* Step 3: process the answer section
00145      *  return only the most desirable entry.
00146      *  TODO: perhaps return a list of the decoded priority/weight/port/target
00147      */
00148     
00149     minpriority = INT_MAX;
00150     for (i = ancount; i > 0; --i) {
00151         size = dn_expand(ans.buf, msgend, msg, srv_name, sizeof(srv_name));
00152         if (size < 0) 
00153             return (CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_ERR);
00154         msg = msg + size;
00155         GETSHORT(type, msg);
00156         GETSHORT(class, msg);
00157         GETLONG(ttl, msg);
00158         GETSHORT(size, msg);
00159         if ((end = msg + size) > msgend)
00160             return (-1);
00161         
00162         if (type != T_SRV) {
00163             msg = end;
00164             continue;
00165         }
00166         
00167         /* if the priority is numerically lower (more desirable) then remember
00168          * everything -- note that priority is destroyed, but we don't use it
00169          * when we register a prefix so it doesn't matter -- only the host
00170          * and port are necessary.
00171          */
00172         GETSHORT(priority, msg);
00173         if (priority < minpriority) {
00174             minpriority = priority;
00175             GETSHORT(weight, msg);
00176             GETSHORT(port, msg);
00177             size = dn_expand(ans.buf, msgend, msg, host, sizeof(host));
00178             if (size < 0)
00179                 return (-1);
00180         }
00181         msg = end;
00182     }
00183     
00184         // not used for now
00185         (void)sizeof(weight);
00186         (void)sizeof(ttl);
00187         (void)sizeof(class);
00188     
00189     if (hostp) {
00190         *hostp = strdup(host);
00191         if (!*hostp)
00192             return (-1);
00193     }
00194     if (portp) {
00195         *portp = port;
00196     }
00197     return (0);
00198 }
00199 
00200 enum ccn_upcall_res
00201 incoming_interest(struct ccn_closure *selfp,
00202                   enum ccn_upcall_kind kind,
00203                   struct ccn_upcall_info *info)
00204 {
00205     const unsigned char *ccnb = info->interest_ccnb;
00206     struct ccn_indexbuf *comps = info->interest_comps;
00207     const unsigned char *comp0 = NULL;
00208     size_t comp0_size = 0;
00209     int res;
00210     struct ccndc_data *ccndc = (struct ccndc_data *)selfp->data;
00211     
00212     if (kind == CCN_UPCALL_FINAL)
00213         return (CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_OK);
00214     if (kind != CCN_UPCALL_INTEREST)
00215         return (CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_ERR);
00216     if (comps->n < 1)
00217         return (CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_OK);
00218     
00219     
00220     res = ccn_ref_tagged_BLOB(CCN_DTAG_Component, ccnb, comps->buf[0], comps->buf[1],
00221                               &comp0, &comp0_size);
00222     if (res < 0 || comp0_size > (NS_MAXDNAME - 12))
00223         return (CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_OK);
00224     if (memchr(comp0, '.', comp0_size) == NULL)
00225         return (CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_OK);
00226     
00227     res = ccndc_srv(ccndc, comp0, comp0_size);
00228     
00229     if (res < 0)
00230         return (CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_ERR);
00231     
00232     return (CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_OK);
00233 }
